abstract.t: This document defines a "dai" parameter for the "tel" Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to support the Dial Around Indicator (DAI). The "dai" parameter is associated with the "cic" parameter, defined in [RFC4694], and indicates how the carrier identified in the "cic" parameter was selected. This document also expands the use of the "cic" parameter to support pre-subscribed and dialed long-distance carrier requirements.
